subject: Boats and Boating
Suits and Litigation
lead_paragraph: The America’s Cup champion Alinghi rejected an offer to settle a lawsuit brought by an American syndicate, and asked its rival to drop legal proceedings.The United States syndicate, Golden Gate Yacht Club, home of BMW Oracle Racing, made a last-ditch offer yesterday for a joint settlement. BMW Oracle Racing was contending that Desafio Español’s status as official challenger, which allowed it to negotiate the format of the next America’s Cup, was illegal.BMW Oracle wanted the right to replace Desafio Español and draw up new rules for the next regatta with Alinghi. But Alinghi’s club, Société Nautique de Genève, rejected the move shortly after it was presented.Golden Gate said that the offer was endorsed by fellow challengers Emirates Team New Zealand, Team Origin and Team Shosholoza.
